name: Hilton Columbus/Polaris

reviews.text: Newer Hotel, great beds, perfect place to work with plenty of desk place, shower only in some rooms (prefer that). Staff great, clean room, excellent value, perfect location, free parking, next to upscale Mall with food, shops and fun to chill after long day. Like the workout room and pool too.
reviews.title: A business travelers' dream

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel over night for a conference. I found it to be very clean, the workers were friendly, and the location was perfect. Word to the wise bring a sweater or dress warmly if you will be attending a conference as the ballroom is freezing!
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.text: service at the front desk is great. Rooms are very clean and well appointed. Hotel still feels, looks and smells new.
reviews.title: Great service and rooms

reviews.text: Convenient location to Polaris Mall.
reviews.title: Good Hotel for a Conference

reviews.text: I shared a room with a friend for two nights to attend a conference at this hotel. The location is close to the interstate and easy to find. Check-in by a friendly staff member was a breeze. Our double queen room on the 8th floor was immaculate and spacious. My bed was very comfortable with fresh linens. There were nice Peter Thomas Roth products in the bathroom. The room was quiet and room temperature was easily controlled.
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.text: Assumed this would be your standard Hilton Hotel and pretty much knew what to expect. However, the Hilton Polaris exceeded my expectations. From the Shuttle Drivers who took me to and from hotel to airport to the front desk staff to the restaurnt personnel, every staff member was especially friendly, professional, accomodating, pleasant, attentive, and made a big difference, during my 2 night stay. The location is great too, only 15 min. ride from airport (complimentary shuttle service) and close to many restaurants and the Polaris Mall.
reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!

reviews.text: Requested a quiet room (was in Columbus due to sudden death of close friend) and was upgraded to room 911. Obviously, I was a bit hesitant about that room #, but decided to take that room anyhow. Great room, quiet, clean and spacious, w very comfy bed, luxurious bedding and towels. Appreciated the complimentary bottles of water!
reviews.title: Well-trained staff with comfortable surroundings

reviews.text: Restaurant and Lounge both excellent with great food, ambience, and wait staff! Hosted Sunday brunch for 6 people and it was lovely and plentiful with lots of quality choices plus eggs, waffles, etc. made to order.
reviews.title: Tasteful, spacious, comfortable

reviews.text: As a smoker in a non-smoking hotel, I appreciated the hotel's efforts to provide outdoor areas w comfortable seating for smoking. Given it was Jan, the outside fire pit was especially welcoming.
reviews.title: Beautiful and new but operated by amateurs

reviews.text: Highly recommend this hotel and would be delighted to stay there again.
reviews.title: Clean and perfect for a conference

reviews.text: We stayed at the Hilton Polaris for 2 nights for a conference this weekend. The rooms and conference areas were great and had no complaints on the look of the exterior or interior (maybe it's newer?). There were a lot of kids using the pool area and I think this would be a great stop for any family traveling on I71. There is plenty to do around the hotel with numerous restaurants and stores. When we checked out and returned home we discovered we left clothes hanging in the closet. When we called the hotel they transfered us to Housekeeping where we got their voicemail. We called back again and they told us they would transfer us again. After some prying, the hotel took our name (customer service was lacking here), but the next day we called back and housekeeping had our items. Would we stay here again - absolutely!
reviews.title: Pretty Good Hotel

reviews.text: This hotel is what I would consider a benchmark for all hotels to try to mimic. The lobby has a beautiful fire feature and the staff was welcoming and efficient!
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

reviews.text: The room itself was spacious and had a functional layout and included interesting art.
reviews.title: Big rooms, seems very new

reviews.text: The bathroom was amazing. The granite counter tops and tiled shower made me feel as though I was visiting a millionaire friend for the evening. The water pressure was almost too high, but after a long day of working in the military, it helped me relax.
reviews.title: Very Good hotel

reviews.text: There isn't much nearby in the way of breakfast, so enjoy what the hotel has to offer.
reviews.title: Great Experience Reasonable Rate

reviews.text: Hilton - Polaris is a solid, consitent "business" hotel located in a major retail hub in north Columbus. Rooms are large, clean and well turned out. The staff is friendly and helpful. The hotel has all of the 'usual" amenities - pool, lounge, gym, business center, meeting facilites and I think that there is a spa there as well. There is great access to any number of retail and restaurant options - to include a very good steak house right in-front of the hotel. The only real distinguishing feature are the "fire features" out back - kinda neat burning torch type things. So take it for what it is - a nice, comfortable, consistent albiet generic business hotel with access to a ton of retail and restaurant options.
reviews.title: Solid, consistent business hotel with access to great retail/restaurants

reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel about 10 times in the past few years. I just love this hotel. The rooms are always clean and comfortable. I book the suite with the parlor which have been located at the end of the hall. There is no noise at all which is very important to me. The beds are comfortable with wonderful linens. It is located near many great restaurants and a mall. I have never had a problem at this hotel. Great place to stay.
reviews.title: Always stay here when in Columbus

reviews.text: Stayed one night while visting Columbus. Beautiful property with spacious rooms and a very friendly, accomodating staff. Great location to shopping and restaurants, free parking and easy access to the highways. Quick trip to downtown and getting on our way home quickly. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
reviews.title: Excellant hotel with a staff to match

reviews.text: I have stayed here 2 times once with my family and once with just the hubby and enjoyed it both times, very nice location to all the resturaunts and shopping is fantastic
reviews.title: Love the hotel and location

reviews.text: This newer Hilton property is a must-stay in the Columbus area! It's immaculate, modern, comfortable and in an excellent location with tons of restaurant and shopping choices! I stay there regularly for business and even brought my family to the hotel over the holidays and enjoyed the mall and the nice indoor pool.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel with 5 Star, Honest Staff!

description: Set in the thriving Polaris Centers of Commerce, the AAA Four Diamond Hilton Columbus/Polaris hotel offers an elegant stay in an excellent location. Just off Interstate 71 and featuring a complimentary shuttle to and from Port Columbus International Airport (CMH), this Columbus, OH hotel is ideally located near transportation links. The shuttle is available 6:00am to 10:30pm Monday through Friday and 7:00am to 10:00pm on weekends.
